From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

This page is no longer active. It is being kept for historical interest.
No discussion is needed to revive this page; simply remove the {{inactive}} tag and bring it up to date.

Fastest Growing Wiktionaries[edit]
January 7, 2004: 31,005, + 505 or 1.66%
January 7, 2004 - February 1, 2004: 32,000, + 1,000 or 3.23 %
February 1, 2004 - March 1, 2004: 33,217, + 1,217 or 3.80 %
March 1, 2004 - April 1, 2004: en:, 35,050, + 1,833 or 5.23 %, fr: 200, pl: 280
April 1, 2004 - May 1, 2004:
en: 37,645, + 2,595 or 7.4%
fr: 417, + 217 or 108.5%
pl: 4,230, + 3,950 or 1,410.71%
May 1, 2004 - Jun 1, 2004:
Annual:
en: + 8,694 or 28.04%*
Σ: + 17,129 or 55.25%*
Fastest Growing by percentage[edit]
Average growth from April 1 to May 1, 2004
Polish 1,410.71%
French 108.5 %
English 21.43 %
